doc:
Dick Jones (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Jones_(actor) 0 Richard Percy Jones (February 25, 1927 – July 7, 2014), known as Dick Jones or Dickie Jones, was an American actor and singer who achieved success as a child performer and as a young adult, especially in B-Westerns. In 1938, he played Artimer "Artie" Peters, nephew of Buck Peters, in the Hopalong Cassidy film, The Frontiersman. He may be best known as the voice of Pinocchio in Walt Disney's film of the same name. Richard_Percy_Jones ( February_25_,_1927 – July_7_,_2014 ) , known as Dick_Jones or Dickie_Jones , was an_American_actor and singer who achieved success as a_child_performer and as a_young_adult , especially in B-Westerns . In 1938 , he played Artimer_"_Artie_"_Peters , nephew of Buck_Peters , in the_Hopalong_Cassidy_film , The_Frontiersman . He may_be_best_known as the_voice of Pinocchio in Walt_Disney 's_film of the_same_name .
